job.title: $24/hour | CNC Machinist | Professional Growth!
job.description:
Position: CNC Machinist

Location: Tulsa, OK

Pay: $24/hour

Experience: Maintenance, repair, testing, and troubleshooting of machinery; ability to read blueprints and technical manuals; operation of hoists, cranes, and hand/power tools.

Education: High School Diploma/GED preferred; technical training/certifications a plus.

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Monday – Thursday, 3:30pm to 2:00am


ProRecruiters is seeking a CNC Machinist to join a growing and dynamic team!


Job Description:

  1. Inspect and test machines to identify malfunctions and ensure repairs meet specifications.
  2. Perform preventive maintenance, lubrication, and cleaning of machine parts.
  3. Disassemble, repair, replace, and reassemble machinery components.
  4. Read and interpret blueprints, diagrams, sketches, and technical documentation.
  5. Use hand tools, power tools, meters, hoists, and related equipment to perform repairs.
  6. Order or request replacement parts and coordinate fabrication when needed.
  7. Follow all company policies, safety procedures, and PPE requirements.


Position Requirements:

  1. Ability to lift and handle materials up to 50 lbs safely.
  2. Comfortable working in environments with heat, cold, dust, noise, and industrial fluids.
  3. Ability to stand, walk, bend, and reach for extended periods.
  4. Proficient in interpreting mechanical, electrical, hydraulic, and pneumatic drawings.
  5. Basic computer skills (Outlook, Word, Excel).
  6. Strong communication skills to coordinate with supervisors and team members.
  7. Willingness to work overtime as needed to support production.


ProRecruiters is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how work is bought, sold and delivered to enable access to the American Dream.


We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

job.title: $195,000/year | Controller | Start ASAP!
job.description:
Position: Controller 

Location: Tulsa, OK 

Pay: $195,000/year

Experience:  

  1. 10+ years of accounting or finance experience (industry agnostic)
  2. 5+ years’ experience in close/reporting responsibilities for a multi-site organization
  3. Manufacturing and/or cost accounting experience preferred

Education: 

  1. Bachelor’s degree in accounting 
  2. MBA/CPA preferred but not required

Type: Full-time; Direct Hire

Schedule: Monday - Friday, 8:00am to 5:00am 

  

ProRecruiters is seeking a Controller to join a growing and dynamic team!   

  

Job Description: 

  1. Oversee close and financial reporting processes for a multi-site organization
  2. Ensure compliance with U.S. GAAP and maintain strong internal controls
  3. Analyze financial and operational data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities
  4. Partner with plant managers and executive leadership to communicate financial insights
  5. Support budgeting, forecasting, and critical reporting cycles
  6. Leverage advanced Excel skills to organize, analyze, and present complex datasets
  7. Contribute to continuous improvement initiatives, particularly within manufacturing or cost accounting environments


Position Requirements:    

  1. Strong analytical mindset with the ability to link financial results to operational performance
  2. Naturally curious, clear thinker who can generate alternatives and drive positive change
  3. Proven leadership and people management skills with experience developing talent
  4. Excellent verbal and written communication skills; able to translate financial concepts for all levels of the organization
  5. High attention to detail with strong organizational skills
  6. Ability to work under pressure and adapt during critical reporting, forecasting, and budgeting cycles
  7. Collaborative team player who works effectively across cross-functional teams

 

 Benefits/Perks:

  1. Full Benefit package


ProRecruiters is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how work is bought, sold and delivered to enable access to the American Dream.  

 

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

job.title: Up to $26/hour | Machinist | Hiring ASAP!
job.description:
Position: Machinist

Location: Tulsa, OK

Pay: $24–$26/hour

Experience: Experienced Haas mill machinist with job shop background and setup capability.

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Split shift; Monday–Thursday, 10:00 AM to 8:30 PM (Friday as needed).


ProRecruiters is seeking a Machinist to join a growing and dynamic team!


Job Description:

  1. Set up and operate Haas mills to produce precision components.
  2. Perform own machine setups and edit programs as required.
  3. Machine parts using 4th-axis operations when applicable.
  4. Operate and support Fanuc-controlled lathes as needed.
  5. Inspect parts to ensure dimensional accuracy and quality standards.
  6. Troubleshoot machining issues and make process adjustments.
  7. Maintain a clean and organized work area in a climate-controlled shop.


Position Requirements:

  1. Strong experience with Haas milling machines in a job shop environment.
  2. Working knowledge of 4th-axis machining operations.
  3. Ability to edit programs and complete setups independently.
  4. Knowledge of Fanuc-operated lathes preferred.
  5. Strong problem-solving and mechanical aptitude.
  6. Ability to complete on-the-spot machining quizzes without computer or phone access.


ProRecruiters is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how work is bought, sold, and delivered to enable access to the American Dream.

 

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

job.title: $23 to $25/hour | Machinist | Hiring ASAP!
job.description:
Position: Machinist 

Location: Tulsa, OK 

Pay: $23 to $25/hour 

Experience: Previous operation or machining experience.

Type: Full-time; Contract  

Schedule: Monday-Thursday, 7:00am to 4:00pm. Friday, 7:00am to 3:00pm. 

  

ProRecruiters is seeking a Machinist to join a growing and dynamic team!   

  

Job Description: 

  1. Operate and maintain a horizontal hone machine (Sunnen)
  2. Perform precision honing to meet tight tolerances and specifications
  3. Inspect finished parts to ensure quality and compliance
  4. Follow all safety, quality, and FAA-related procedures
  5. Maintain accurate production and inspection documentation
  6. Work efficiently to meet production goals while maintaining high standards

 

Position Requirements:    

  1. Ability to read blueprints, specs, and work instructions
  2. Experience using precision measuring tools
  3. Familiarity with regulated or aerospace environments is a plus

job.title: Up to $85k/year | Mechanical Designer | Tulsa, OK
job.description:
Position: Mechanical Designer 

Location: Tulsa, OK 

Pay: $55,000 to $85,000/year

Experience:  

  1. Engineering science and mechanical design applications experience.
  2. Basic electronics, hardware/software systems, and technical experience.
  3. Business, customer service, and administrative experience.

Education: Bachelor’s degree (with moderate-term on-the-job training). 

Type: Full-time; Contract  

Schedule: Monday - Friday, 8:00am to 5:00pm

  

ProRecruiters is seeking a Mechanical Designer to join a growing and dynamic team! This role is responsible for the design, development, and support of custom machines and machine components, working closely with engineering, project management, and sales teams.  

  

Job Description:  

  1. Design and draft machines and machine components using 3D CAD software.
  2. Prepare calculations for tolerances, dimensions, and structural analysis.
  3. Create technical drawings and pneumatic plans.
  4. Develop prototypes and perform physical testing to validate designs.
  5. Collaborate with design, purchasing, and project teams throughout development.
  6. Support production feasibility, assembly, and installation processes.
  7. Revise and improve existing products based on customer feedback and data.
  8. Ensure designs comply with industry standards and company procedures.
  9. Provide mechanical support to project managers and the sales team, including customer presentations.


Position Requirements: 

  1. Advanced proficiency in Solid Edge 3D CAD software.
  2. Strong understanding of mechanical design principles, machining, and cutting tool technology.
  3. Knowledge of precision drafting, blueprints, and technical drawings.
  4. Understanding of machines, tools, materials, manufacturing processes, and quality control.
  5. Knowledge of engineering applications, materials, manufacturing processes, and quality control
  6. Ability to plan, schedule, coordinate, and troubleshoot effectively.
  7. Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
  8. Familiarity with electronics, hardware/software systems, and technical documentation.
  9. Strong communication skills and working knowledge of business, customer service, and administrative practices.


Travel Requirements:

  1. National and international travel required.
  2. Comfortable working in foreign countries is expected.
  3. Occasional extended, multi-week assignments may occur.
  4. Multi-language proficiency is a plus, but not required.

 

ProRecruiters is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how work is bought, sold and delivered to enable access to the American Dream.  

 

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

job.title: $24/hour | Experienced Industrial Painter (2nd Shift) | Tulsa, OK
job.description:
Position: Industrial Painter

Location: Tulsa, OK

Pay: $24/hour

Experience:

  1. 2-3 years of experience painting pipes (Industrial fabrication or equipment manufacturing painting).
  2. Ability to paint to specification; must pass on-site paint test.

Education: High School Diploma.

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Monday – Thursday, 4:30pm to 3:00am


ProRecruiters is seeking an Industrial Painter to join a growing and dynamic team!


Job Description:

  1. Apply multi-coat industrial coating systems such as zinc, epoxy, urethane, and below-grade materials.
  2. Perform detailed rework, masking, precision painting, and hand-sanding in tight areas.
  3. Paint 4–6 ft pipe sections, ensuring full, even coverage and correct film thickness.
  4. Work underneath fixed pipe sections to achieve a consistent application.
  5. Follow exact specifications rather than basic color application.
  6. Use company tools and equipment as required.


Position Requirements:

  1. Ability to complete and pass an on-site industrial paint test.
  2. Comfortable with repetitive, highly meticulous work.
  3. Strong attention to detail and patience in rework tasks.


Job Perks: 

  1. Unlimited Career Growth Opportunities 
  2. Health Benefits after 30 days! 
  3. Weekly Paychecks! 
  4. Career coaching opportunities! 


ProRecruiters is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how work is bought, sold and delivered to enable access to the American Dream.


We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

job.title: $18/hour | Yard Operator | Professional Growth!
job.description:
Position: Yard Operator

Location: Tulsa, OK

Pay: $18/hour

Experience: Experience operating large forklifts (10,000 lbs. or greater) required.

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Monday–Friday, 5:00 AM to 3:30 PM


ProRecruiters is seeking a Yard Operator to join a growing and dynamic team!


Job Description:

  1. Operate large forklifts to move and stage materials in the yard.
  2. Keep yard areas organized to support truck access and maneuverability.
  3. Stage materials for loading and unloading operations.
  4. Assist with positioning materials near buildings and work areas.
  5. Monitor yard conditions to maintain safe and efficient operations.
  6. Communicate yard needs or issues to supervisors as needed.


Position Requirements:

  1. Strong awareness of safety practices when operating heavy equipment.
  2. Ability to work outdoors in varying weather conditions.
  3. Good spatial awareness and attention to surroundings.
  4. Ability to follow instructions and work independently.
  5. Reliable attendance and punctuality.
